About

We are the leaders in Christian care for seniors

Bethany Christian Care is a Brethren organisation that provides loving careâ€”holistic, person-centred and inclusiveâ€”that covers the full spectrum of senior's accommodation and care needs.

When we serve you, itâ€™s about person-to-person careâ€”where you feel genuinely known and understood.

How we operate

We operate under the Letters Patent pursuant to the Religious, Educational and Charitable Institutions Act 1861â€“1967. We are a public benevolent institution and registered charity.

Our board and corporation members are drawn from Christian Brethren Assemblies in south-east Queensland.

Our purpose

We serve and honour the people in our communities by enabling them to live abundantly.

Our mission

We create beautiful environments for everyone who lives and works in our communities, where people can see and feel Christ's love in action.

Our values

Virtue

Decency | Honesty

Our residents and their families are at the centre of all of our decisions and behaviours.

Acceptance

Forgiveness | Impartiality

Every person is welcome, no matter their denomination or faith.

Love

Compassion | Gentleness

We are inspired by Christ's unconditional love.

Understanding

Empathy | Sensitivity

We view each person as an individual with a unique story, hopes and dreams.

Excellence

Quality | Diligence

We comply with regulations, employ exceptional staff and are always looking for ways to improve.

Serving

Humility | Kindness

We exist to serve our residents, and they are also supported by our volunteer network.

Our history

Over our 70 years we have grown and changed, but our heart to provide beautiful communities for people to enjoy remains the same. Read more about our history as an organisation.

Our people

We have a large team of people who exist to serve our residents and enable them to live more abundantly. Read more about our board and management teams.

Our volunteers

We nurture a large network of volunteers who add an extra layer of love and care for our aged care residents. Learn more about the unique support available or how you can help.

Support us

As a registered charity, we welcome financial gifts and bequests. You can choose to support our pastoral support fund or our general work. All donations more than $2 are tax deductible.
